amendment.description: To provide authority to use economic assistance appropriations for "Transition Initiatives", and for other purposes.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1979 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 1979 proposed by Senator McConnell. (consideration: CR S13344-13345; text: CR S13344) To provide authority to use economic assistance appropriations for "Transition Initiatives", and for other purposes.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1979 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1979 proposed by Senator McConnell.
